body.p: your petitioners would Respectfully Represent that on the day of the Spring Term of the Owsley Circuit Court for 1860 Wm B, Green was fine thirty Dollars for Shooting at a Dog the property of Thos J, Treadway. Sd Green was Drunk at the Time Returng from from the Election where Treadway & him. had had some sharp words: Being of Different politics. Green was in Triumphs and makeing a good Deal of noise, & Treadway set his dog on him, Green shot at him Treadways Wife was in a Delicate condition at the Time consequently Green was fined for it But there was alas no Damage done. They are boath small men and too apt to want to fight but neither of them is able to whip any Boddy. They are at this time good friends no dogs Killed in the scrape frequently Hunt together & drink together Green is a vary poore man &C

Wm B Green
J, E, Gibson

Remitted Jan 20
Owsley Cir. Ct
$30
Wm B. Green
I
